item.description:
This is our SIXTH (yes, 6th) anniversary celebration. We'll have food, food, activities and ATC swaps. More details to come, but please RSVP now!

MAY 2013 REGULAR ATC SWAPS (bring 4 cards to participate)

1. Encyclopedia of….
2. Body parts (hands, feet, eyes, etc…)--think of this as figure drawing or anatomical illustration.
3. Technique swap: Watercolor--either based on techniques demonstrated at April 2013 Meetup, or any watercolor technique

MAY 2013 FOLLOW-UP THEMES (for swaps people missed due to winter weather in early 2013; bring 4 cards to participate)

  1. Queens or other royalty
  2. Fortune cookies

GEORGIA PEACHES SWAP (even one card will get you in here; please bring at least one card to trade, if possible)
Themes:

  1. Steampunk unicorns (about 6 cards available)
  2. Scrabble (about 6 cards available)
  3. Artist's Choice (many cards available)

Should be lots of fun. Please RSVP now.

DEMO: Since this is our anniversary meetup, and the "modern" anniversary gift for the 6th year is wood, we will explore a couple of techniques for creating wood grain using paint and implements. Bring brown, black and/or yellow hued crayons or waterproof markers, brown acrylic paint or watercolor paint, brushes you like for washes (wider are usually better) and scrap pieces of watercolor paper. As usual, supplies will be available to share and for those who do not have these items in their art stock pile.
item.how_to_find_us: Enter through door near back off church, off parking lot

group.name: New England Artist Trading Cards Plus (ATCs+) Meetup Group

item.name: NE ATC+ May 2013 Monthly Meetup in Natick
